name: chick
description: Sunny, a fluffy little chick with bright yellow feathers. What name would you choose for this adorable baby bird?

name: frog
description: Jumpy, a lively frog with a vibrant green complexion. What name would you give to this energetic amphibian?

name: monkey
description: Banana, a playful monkey swinging through the trees. What name would you choose for this cheeky primate?

name: fox
description: Rusty, a cunning fox with a fiery coat. What name would you give to this sly creature?
